about_the_game:
Slaughter hoards of monsters using a wide range of combat abilities, spells and weapons. Fight your way to destroy the monster generators to slow the hoard and open the exit.

Unlock abilities, characters, maps and more by completing Achievements.

Find Unique, Overpowered Builds

Collect XP gems to level up, providing options to improve your character or abilities each time. Find the right build to dominate those monsters. Utilities may also be offered, hopefully just when you need them!

Dungeons

Handcrafted dungeons include food, keys, doors, bombs, traps, secrets and teleporters for classic gameplay. Find optional challenges along the way!

Play Your Way

Choose the challenge level to suit your mood or skills each run - receive bonus XP and Gold for higher difficulties, or blast through on a more relaxing run. Achievements can be unlocked on any difficulty. Unlocks provides greater variety and options, not a power increase.

Gold, Gold, Gold

Between crawls, spend your collected gold to purchase unlocked items, abilities and utilities. When beginning a new Monster Crawl, buy items to aid you!

Monsters

You'll meet different monsters, each with their own abilities and attack styles. Kill them all to death.

2 Player Local Co-Op

Team up to crush your enemies with local co-op (Steam Remote Play compatible).

Controller recommended for monster crawling (single player or co-op).
